title: Red Cloak - Novel Updates
tags: Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Co-Workers   Cold Love Interests   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Obsessive Love   Office Romance   R-18   Strong Love Interests   Weak Protagonist   Werebeasts
author: 키아르네
description:
“You’re a werewolf?”
“Yeah.”
“Are you joking?”
“I’d rather be joking.”
“Have you been vaccinated against rabies?”

On a full moon day when the werewolf’s instincts become stronger, Ha-eun follows team leader Joo Won and learns his secret.

“We will do it again next time.”

Ha-eun’s face brightened. Thanks to that, she looked even more delicious. Joo Won continued, remembering how sweet Ha-eun had melted that night.

“You will be begging me to imprint to you.”>
